// This example macro shows how to use the getProfile() function

// Set alt key down to average horizontally; requires 1.33k
  //setKeyDown("alt");
 
// Close "Log" window
  if (isOpen("Log")) {
      selectWindow("Log");
      run("Close");
  }

// Get profile and display values in "Log" window
  profile = getProfile();
  for (i=0; i<profile.length; i++)
      print(i+"  "+profile[i]);

// Save as Excel compatible text file
  //selectWindow("Log");
  //run("Text...", "save=/Users/wayne/Desktop/Log.txt");
